snippet: Egyptian activists released a brutally frank video on Friday, urging volunteers to join their campaign against sexual assaults during demonstrations.
abstract: Egyptian activists released a brutally frank video on Friday, urging volunteers to join their campaign against sexual assaults during demonstrations.

headline.main: Frank Video of Mass Sexual Assault in Cairo Is Released by Anti-Harassment Activists

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
